page.title: 03Communication
page.content: {Newton Toney Post Office}We went to Newton Toney Post Office and interviewed {Miss S.M.Albury.}The Post Office gets about 2 sacks of letters a day. She works from 9.00am to 12.00 noon then from 2.00pm to 5.30pm. I liked her very much.{Newton Toney {School}We went to Newton Toney School to ask them some questions and we interviewed a boy called{Sean}and he lives in Cholderton.Their letters are delivered at 9.00am but he does not know who delivers their letters.{ {Boscombe Post Office }We went to Boscombe Post Office and interviewed { {Mrs E.M.Wagg.}Each day they get about 4 sacks of letters. They have been robbed once but did not catch him or her. I thought she was very pleasant and it was nice of her to give up her time.
